name: subroutines
description: SubRoutines is a todo list and task application for those small, repeatable or rarely need lists. From you morning checklist to annual packing lists, SubRoutines is the memory aid we all could use.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i

author: Aaron M. Haag
